# guerre

𒉽 KUR₂ (Kreuz/cross/guerre) ⚔ 𒄈 GÍR

𓋴 𓂋 𓃱 𓀁 𓂚 𓀜 | challenge to battle | guerre ≈ giraffe ≈ anGriff

𐎌𐎗𐎗 šrr "enemy"

𒉬 akar a'gear "armor" @ guerre Akk. 𒀊𒈛𒌅 ap-luḫ-tu apluhtu

𒃪 GA₂×U guerre Krieg "battle" #ula₂

𒄯 ᵍḪAR guerre in 𒄯𒊏𒀭 ᵍḫar-ra-an "campaign"

𒄑𒀉𒃸 ĝeš'a₂kar₂ = 𒉬 akar "gear"

𒆕 KAK ≈ Krieg in 𒄑𒆕 Kriegsgerät weapon 𒅗𒀝𒆕 #kakku цирхъ cirq guerre

𒈓 gigam ≈ Krieg "conflict, war" #ippīru inbir

𒂆 𒂇 āšĝar 𒍏𒀉𒀸𒃻 axe

𒍽 ≈ 𓃗 घोड़ा ghoṛāˢ 𓎼 𓄿 𓍯 𓄿 𓄛 𓏪 Ghauras 𓃗 “horse“ ⇔ γοργός gorgós उग्र 𒀲𒆳𒊏 kur+ra

𒂟𒍽 battle #ᵍerimhuš

𒆠𒆘 garaš₂ garrison 𓊖 "military camp" Akk. karaš karāšu •Kreis 𓊖
𒉽𒃻 KÚR-šá enemy 𓐍 𓏏 𓆑 𓀀 𒉽𒎌 KÚR[dan]𓏥 𐎌𐎗𐎗 šrr™ "enemy"
𒄈 GÍR ⇔ 𒉽 KUR ⚔ guerre 𒄈𒍑 GÍR.NITA governaut general
𒂷𒊑 ga-ri enemy
𒄀𒊒 ge-ru guerre attack, to be hostile to ⇔ gir 𓂻
𒅅𒆠𒊒 ik-ki-ru guerre, be hostile
𒃼 GAR ≈ guerre in 𒃼𒋥 qar-rad ᵍwarrior
𒃼𒁺 gar₃-du gardu guard , soldier #qardu
𒃼𒊏𒁺 qar-ra-du guerre Garde hero, warlike, warrior
𒄿𒄀𒊏 i-gi-ra make war
𒍚𒆜 #guana "battle" guernica (ligature)

𐛧 𐙇𐘾 KA guerre ⇔ vir force

𒂡 ḫir ⇔ 𒆟 harness < Heer herr “army” ⇔ guerre ƒ
𒂡 šir₃ : 𒆟 Geschirr giscirri “trimmed” skeran “to shear” *(s)ker- “to cut” ƒ/2
𒆟 gir₁₁ girth ⇔ Gurt girder girdle cord *gʰerdʰ- “to encircle“
𒆟 gir₁₁ | yoke | ярмо́ jarmó ꙗрьмъ jarĭmŭ ⇔ 𒂡 ḫir PIE √h₂er- “to join”
